text: The 2010 English cricket season was the 111th in which the County Championship had been an official competition. It began on 29 March with the Champion County match between Durham County Cricket Club and an MCC side, and ended on 18 September with the final of the Clydesdale Bank 40. ==LV County Championship== * Pos = Position, Pld = Played, W = Wins, L = Losses, D = Draws, T = Ties, A = Abandonments, Bat = Batting points, Bowl = Bowling points, Ded = Deducted points, Pts = Points. * Points awarded: W = 16, L = 0, D = 3, A = 3 ===Division One=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" |- !width=175 |Team !width=20 abbr="Played" |Pld !width=20 abbr="Won" |W !width=20 abbr="Lost" |L !width=20 abbr="Drawn" |D !width=20 abbr="Tied" |T !width=20 abbr="Abandoned" |A !width=20 abbr="Batting Points" |Bat !width=20 abbr="Bowling Points" |Bwl !width=20 abbr="Deducted points" |Ded !width=20 abbr="Points" |Pts |- style="background:#fbd009;" |style="text- align:left;"|Nottinghamshire (C) |16||7||5||4||0||0||47||43||0||214 |- style="background:#f9f9f9;" |style="text-align:left;"|Somerset |16||6||2||8||0||0||53||41||0||214 |- style="background:#f9f9f9;" |style="text-align:left;"|Yorkshire |16||6||2||8||0||0||41||42||0||203 |- style="background:#f9f9f9;" |style="text-align:left;"|Lancashire |16||5||3||8||0||0||35||43||0||182 |- style="background:#f9f9f9;" |style="text-align:left;"|Durham |16||5||3||8||0||0||30||39||0||173 |- style="background:#f9f9f9;" |style="text-align:left;"|Warwickshire |16||6||9||1||0||0||20||47||0||166 |- style="background:#f9f9f9;" |style="text-align:left;"|Hampshire |16||3||6||7||0||0||47||41||0||157 |- style="background:#FFCCCC;" |style="text-align:left;"|Kent (R) |16||3||7||6||0||0||42||44||1||151 |- style="background:#FFCCCC;" |style="text-align:left;"|Essex (R) |16||2||6||8||0||0||29||43||2||126 |- |colspan=11 align="left"|Source:.
